messages.subject: sister/vaccinations
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I was reading Melinda in Illinois dilemma with her sister about vaccines. I know how annoying this can seem. Anyway, I think that your sister is just
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
I was reading Melinda in Illinois dilemma with her sister about vaccines.
I know how annoying this can seem.
Anyway, I think that your sister is just fearful and concerned about your
kids, so as much as a pain as that may be, she probably has good intentions,
not just trying to annoy you.
My entire life, I have been blasted with unwanted medical knowledge and
concern, but I have just learned to appreciate the person concerned for my
family and say, oh, thank you, and as time goes by, things work out, and
some of my families biggest critics have changed their views. This goes for
homeschooling too.


Wendy
